items.sentence: Did anyone tell Tom and Mary what time they were supposed to be here?
How can I finish my homework when I have to help you clean the house?
Tom had a life insurance policy worth three hundred thousand dollars.
Tom had to wait on Mary hand and foot after her ankle reconstruction.
Tom has been living in the woods by himself for the last three years.
Tom apparently hasn\'t yet told Mary that he\'s not going to do that.
Tom has never been to Boston before, so I offered to show him around.
Tom is fishing for trout about a hundred meters downstream from here.
The front door of Tom\'s house was locked, but the back door wasn\'t.
Where were you when you realized that you didn\'t have your umbrella?
Tom would\'ve liked you. It\'s too bad that you never met each other.
Tom\'s mother said he\'d ruin his eyes if he sat too close to the TV.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary should drive home since she\'s been drinking.
Let\'s forget about our differences and focus on how we\'re the same.
Sometimes it seems to me that you just don\'t really want to be here.
I tried to get to sleep again, but I felt restless and uncomfortable.
I wanted Tom to ask Mary if she was planning to go to Boston with us.
Tom told Mary all the things John didn\'t do that he could have done.
Can you do me a favor and go to the supermarket and buy me some eggs?
Many people died because there weren\'t enough lifeboats on the ship.
